008 *******************************************************************************/
009package imagingbook.common.geometry.line;
010
011import java.util.Locale;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014import imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic;
015
016/**
017 * This class represents a line in slope-intercept form: y = k x + d.
018 * Instances are immutable. Not all possible lines in the 2D plane
019 * can be represented.
020 * A {@link SlopeInterceptLine} is merely a {@link AlgebraicLine}
021 * with a special constructor and getter methods for k, d.
022 */
023public class SlopeInterceptLine extends AlgebraicLine {
024        
025        public SlopeInterceptLine(double k, double d) {
026                super(k, -1, d);
027        }
028        
029        public SlopeInterceptLine(AlgebraicLine al) {
030                super(al.getParameters());
031                if (Arithmetic.isZero(al.B)) {
032                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("cannot convert vertical line (B=0)");
033                }
034        }
035        
036        public double getK() {
037                return A / -B;  // = k
038        }
039
040        public double getD() {
041                return C / -B;  // = d
042        }
043        
044        /**
045         * Returns the line's y-value for the specified x-position.
046         * @param x position along the x-axis
047         * @return the associated y-value
048         */
049        public double getY(double x) {
050                return (A * x + C) / -B;        // = y = k * x + d
051        }
052        
053        // --------------------------------------------------
054        
055        @Override
056        public String toString() {
057                return String.format(Locale.US, "%s <A=%.3f B=%.3f C=%.3f k=%.3f, d=%.3f>",
058                                this.getClass().getSimpleName(), A, B, C, getK(), getD());
059        }
060        
061        // --------------------------------------------------
062        
063        public static void main (String[] args) {
064                Pnt2d p1 = Pnt2d.from(1, 2);
065                Pnt2d p2 = Pnt2d.from(4, 3);
066                
067                AlgebraicLine al1 = AlgebraicLine.from(p1, p2);
068                System.out.println("al1 = " + al1);
069                
070                SlopeInterceptLine sl = new SlopeInterceptLine(al1);
071                System.out.println("sl = " + sl);
072                System.out.println("sl k = " + (sl.A / -sl.B));
073                System.out.println("sl d = " + (sl.C / -sl.B));
074                
075                AlgebraicLine al2 = AlgebraicLine.from(sl);
076                System.out.println("al2 = " + al2);
077                
078                System.out.println("al1 = al2 ? " + al1.equals(al2, 1e-6));
079        }
080/*
081al1 = AlgebraicLine <a=0.316, b=-0.949, c=1.581>
082sl = SlopeInterceptLine <A=0.316 B=-0.949 C=1.581 k=0.333, d=1.667>
083sl k = 0.33333333333333337
084sl d = 1.6666666666666665
085al2 = AlgebraicLine <a=0.316, b=-0.949, c=1.581>
086al1 = al2 ? true
087*/
088}
